oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Facile synthesis of twisted graphene solution from graphite-KCl
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SWAIN, AK
BAHADUR, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: HIGH-YIELD PRODUCTION
INTERCALATION COMPOUNDS
BILAYER GRAPHENE
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple technique is demonstrated to produce twisted bi- and tri-layer graphene by mild sonication of exfoliated graphite on a large scale. No oxidation or reduction of graphite is involved in this process. Hydrothermally synthesized graphite-KCl compound is used to prepare exfoliated graphite.
